input.sentences: a bride and groom making their vows .
the newly weds posing for a photo .

output.sentences: The bride and groom began to state their vows.
After the ceremony the newly weds began posing for their photo.
The bride and groom decided they would be dressing in all white for their wedding.
The mother and bride enjjoyed their moment.
The food at the wedding reception was very plain.
